alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Horry; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 8:33PM EDT until June 17 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Dillon County in northeastern South Carolina... Northwestern Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... Northern Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 833 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sellers, or near Marion, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Marion, Mullins, Latta, Sellers, Galivants Ferry, Blue Brick, Zion, Gapway, Rains, Smithboro and Carolinas Hospital System - Marion. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
